name: Durian's Adventures
description:
Overview

Durian's Adventures is a 2D side-scrolling composed by three levels distinguished by 3 different types of difficulty, (easy, medium and hard) the green level is the easy, the yellow is the medium and the red is the hard one.

The objective of the player is to complete all three levels without dying, each level represents a different city infested by a number of “zombies” depending on the level’s difficulty.

The player wins the game if he passes all three levels and reach the “safe zone”, the player loses if he dies along the way.
